[vc_row bg_type=”” dima_canvas_style=”” translate_x=”0″ dima_z_index=”0″ delay=”” animate_item=”” delay_duration=”” delay_offset=””][vc_column min_height=”” bg_type=”” dima_canvas_style=”” translate_x=”0″ dima_z_index=”0″ delay=”” animate_item=”” delay_duration=”” delay_offset=”” width=”1/1″]

The various services provided by the office

Contracts and Agreements

Litigations

Real Estate.

Lawful & Legal Consultancies and studies.

Corporate & Commercial services.

Foreign Investment.

[vc_row_inner bg_type=”” dima_canvas_style=”” translate_x=”0″ dima_z_index=”0″][vc_column_inner delay=”” animate_item=”” delay_duration=”” delay_offset=”” translate_x=”0″ dima_z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″]

Litigation

We master handing all such types of lawsuits including but not limited to (labor, criminal, commercial, administrative, traffic, executions cases)

  • Prosecution before all judicial and quasi-judicial bodies of all types and degrees.
  • We work on drafting and preparing bill of particulars.
  • We provide a comprehensive legal study for the client in case he wants to file a lawsuit, and clarify the strengths and weaknesses along estimation of winning such.
  • Represent clients in all cases brought against them, and pursue to protect their rights and interests.
  • implementation of judicial decisions and judgments of arbitrators, including domestic and foreign judgments.

Contracts and Agreements

  • We prepare and draft all types of contracts, including construction, supply and investment contracts, in addition to that such services we are also providing, drafting reviewing and proof reading agreements and memorandums of understanding.
  • Preparation and conclusion of decisions and legal settlements.

Lawful & Legal Consultancies

  • We are pleased and capable to arrange all legal studies for all

inquiries, topics and procedures required by the contracts

parties with our company in all legal fields.

  • We provide lawful and legal Consultancies to clients in all

regulations at procedures, ensuring the appropriateness of their decisions along with implementation thereof.

  • We pursue to sort out all the Lawful and legal problems encountered by clients along with formalizing and legitimizing such to ensure the sustainable and continuity of their businesses.
  • We provide legal audits, review internal code of procedures and policies to ensure consistency with the provisions of companies ‘law and related regulations.

Corporate & Commercial services

In this regard, our law firm is offering the following services:

  • In corporation all types of companies.
  • Drafting articles of incorporation and amendments thereto, amending the changes in equity either in increase or in decrease.
  • Prepare and Drafting, articles of association code of procedures and governance policies for all types of companies.
  • Attending meeting of board of directors.
  • Registration of trademark and brands.

liquidation of companies

We undertakes the liquidation of companies of all kinds by agreement or judiciary, evaluating their assets, dividing them or selling them, whether by consent or judiciary, and publicizing the liquidations as specified by law.
